hero.title: VONAER
hero.subtitle: A platform proposing a new lifestyle, VONAER is an Urban Air Mobility service.

services.title: VONAER SERVICE
services.subtitle: A platform proposing a new lifestyle, VONAER is an Urban Air Mobility service.

vonPrivate.title: VON Private
vonPrivate.subtitle: VIP service for those who value their time over everything else
vonPrivate.description: VON Private offers a VIP charter service with flexibility to specify your destination and time for a seamless travel experience.

features.feature1: Pick your departure and destination at your convenience
features.feature2: No initiation fee. Purchase credits and make reservation through app
features.feature3: Airport escort, VON Carry, and Von Lounge service

vonRoutine.title: VON Routine
vonRoutine.subtitle: From Gangnam to ICN in 20 minutes
vonRoutine.description: VON Routine offers fast and comfortable air shuttle service between Gangnam and Incheon Airport. Simply make reservation through VONAER app.

features.feature1: Experience next level of comfort from Gangnam to Incheon Airport

vonTour.title: VON Tour
vonTour.subtitle: Enjoy a breath taking sky view of Korea
vonTour.description: Experience Korea like never before with our scenic helicopter tours. Multiple tour packages available.

features.feature1: GwanAk Mountain Tour - Autumn Leaves & Spring Flower Tours
features.feature2: Han River Tour - Seoul Skyline & Cherry Blossom Tours
features.feature3: DMZ Tour - Historical landmarks only available in South Korea

gwanakMountain.name: Gwanak Mountain
gwanakMountain.route: Witness historical landmarks only visible in South Korea. Experience a breathtaking view of North Korea from the sky, across the DMZ.

bukhanMountain.name: Bukhan Mountain
bukhanMountain.route: COEX → Lotte Tower → Seokchon Lake → Bukhan Mountain → Dobong Mountain

dmz.name: DMZ Tour
dmz.route: Witness the historical landmarks only available in South Korea. View of North Korea beyond DMZ from the sky.

usageGuide.title: How to Use VONAER
usageGuide.subtitle: Simple steps to book your premium flight experience

step1.title: Download App
step1.description: Download the VONAER app from App Store or Google Play

step2.title: Create Account
step2.description: Sign up and verify your account with required documents

step3.title: Choose Service
step3.description: Select from VON Private, VON Routine, or VON Tour

step4.title: Book & Fly
step4.description: Make your reservation and enjoy your premium flight experience

step5.title: Boarding
step5.description: Arrive at the helipad at your scheduled time and follow the safety staff's instructions

step6.title: Disembarkation
step6.description: After landing, continue your journey with VON RentCar or VON Limousine for your Last Mile transfer

booking.title: Book Your Flight
booking.subtitle: Experience luxury air travel with VONAER's premium services

value1.title: Time Efficiency
value1.description: We value your time above everything else, providing the fastest routes and minimal waiting times.

value2.title: Safety First
value2.description: Our commitment to safety is unwavering, with rigorous maintenance and certified pilots.

value3.title: Luxury Experience
value3.description: Every journey is crafted to provide the ultimate in comfort and sophistication.

value4.title: Innovation
value4.description: We continuously innovate to bring you the latest in aviation technology and service.

companyStory.title: Our Story
companyStory.description: VONAER was founded with a vision to revolutionize urban air mobility in Korea. We believe that premium air travel should be accessible, efficient, and environmentally conscious. Our team of aviation experts and technology innovators work tirelessly to bring you the future of transportation today.

appDownload.title: Download VONAER App
appDownload.subtitle: Experience the future of air travel at your fingertips

membership.title: VONAER Membership
membership.subtitle: Choose the membership tier that suits your lifestyle and travel needs

terms.term1: All memberships are valid for 12 months from the date of purchase.
terms.term2: Membership benefits are non-transferable and cannot be shared with third parties.
terms.term3: If additional hours are purchased before the membership ends, any remaining hours will be carried over.
terms.term4: Once the dedicated flight hours are exhausted, applicable rate within the member status will apply.
terms.term5: Additional charges may apply for De-icing, Smoking, and Special Catering services.

ancillary.title: Ancillary Service
ancillary.subtitle: Enhance VONAER service with our comprehensive ancillary services

0.title: VON Escort
0.description: Distinguished airport escort service for a true VIP experience

1.title: VON Carry
1.description: Premium baggage delivery service that delivers your luggage to your final destination

2.title: VON Connect
2.description: Car service between Heliport and Airport Terminal

4.title: VON Limousine
4.description: VON Limousine offers VIP black car service for first & last mile.

5.title: VON RentCar
5.description: Rent-a-car service that allows our customers to drive to final destination.

newsletter.title: Stay Updated
newsletter.subtitle: Get the latest news and exclusive offers from VONAER

warning.title: Important Notice
warning.description: Changing the margin will affect all flight prices displayed to customers. The new margin will be applied immediately to all existing and new flights.

midJet.description: Ideal balance of comfort, range, and performance for medium-distance travel with enhanced cabin space.

ultraLongHaul.description: Ultimate in luxury and range for intercontinental flights with hotel-like amenities.
